data.title: Beasley Media Group, LLC
data.text:
Beasley Media Group announces Tampa Bay’s biggest morning show is back! MJ (Todd Schnitt) will be returning as host of the New MJ Morning Show on Q105. In addition, current longtime morning personality Mason Dixon will take over afternoon drive and Geno Knight will shift to middays. The new changes on WRBQ-FM will officially go into effect […]

Beasley Media Group New Jersey’s WMGQ-FM/Magic 98.3 and WCTC-AM recently hosted the first annual Give Hope Radiothon on Thursday, September 10th in conjunction with Children’s Specialized Hospital (CSH), the local Children’s Miracle Network Hospital in NJ. The stations raised over $13,000 dollars to benefit CSH’s COVID-19 Emergency Response Fund which supports any additional needs the hospital may incur

Beginning Saturday October 3rd at 9am, Beasley Media Group’s legendary classic rock station, 94.7 WCSX-FM, will officially debut a 12-week program to air throughout the Fall entitled “Seger Saturdays” in Detroit. The new on-air series will highlight the incredible legacy of Detroit’s iconic rocker, Bob Seger. Hosted by station Morning Show Personality, Big Jim O’Brien,

Beasley Media Group’s B103.9 FM is pleased to announce the First Annual Palm Awards. Hosted by B1039’s Jason Jones (aka Big Mama), the awards will feature more than 70 categories that showcase the very best of what Southwest Florida has to offer from the people, places and all the exciting things our community! “As a resident

Today, Broadcast Music Inc, Beasley Media Group, and Xperi’s HD Radio launched a new series called “100 Years of Hit Makers.” The series is a part of a year-long campaign to celebrate the 100th Anniversary of the first commercial radio broadcast in the U.S., and to highlight the continuing importance of radio, especially in our

Congratulations to Beasley Media Group Philadelphia’s Deena Roemer-Herman on winning the 2020 Radio Wayne Digital Award. The winners were officially announced by Radio Ink magazine during a special virtual awards presentation that took place on Facebook and YouTube. We would also like to recognize our outstanding 2020 Beasley Media Group Finalists: SALES MANAGER OF THE YEAR Jaime Frankel

Beasley Media Group announces the following promotions at 92.5 WXTU-FM in Philadelphia: Charlie Maxx has been promoted to the position of Production Director and Assistant Program Director at the station. In addition, she will be on the air from noon – 3pm. “Charlie has a depth of experience that will be so helpful in her

Beasley Media Group’s Classic Rock 102.9 WMGK-FM & Habitat For Humanity Philadelphia are teaming up to help families in need of affordable housing. The 2nd Annual Gimme Shelter event will take place on Saturday, September 26th, from 11am – 3pm at the Habitat For Humanity Restore located at 2318 Washington Avenue in Philadelphia. Beasley Media Group announces the following staff promotions at Country 102.5 (WKLB-FM) in Boston: Dawn Santolucito has been promoted to the position of Assistant Program Director and Marketing Director at the station. She has been serving as Music Director and Marketing Director at the station since August 2017. She has been with the station for the past

Beasley Media Group announces Jessie Jordan has been named as the new morning show Co-Host of “The Mix Morning Show with Johnny B and Jessie Jordan” on WJBR-FM in Wilmington, Delaware. The new show officially launched on Monday, September 7th at 5:30am. Jordan has been heard on the air in the Delaware Valley since 2004, working
